Creating a More Connected Workplace

To be effective, your hybrid workforce needs to stay safe, connected, and motivated. Businesses need to create environments to bring people together and provide seamless collaboration.

With the right technology and expertise, you can develop a modern workplace where your organisation can adapt and grow in the new world of work.

Deliver excellent user experience and secure collaboration anywhere, anytime

Creating a seamless work experience for your people can be challenging. You need to understand the changing needs of your people and overcome the security risks inherent in the ever-evolving digital workplace.

At Ricoh, we help you design and deliver a productive hybrid workplace to keep your people and business connected. We use class-leading collaboration technologies to deliver excellent user experience and security—anywhere, anytime, on any platform.

Our extensive solutions portfolio and knowledgeable team of workplace experts are ready to help your people connect reliably, collaborate effectively, and make sure they have everything they need to work.

73%
of employees want the flexible remote work option to stay
66%
of business decision-makers are considering redesigning physical spaces

Our Connect & Collaborate Solutions

The best collaboration solutions deliver an intelligent user experience and secure collaboration, anywhere, anytime, on any platform. Ricoh Meeting Solutions will help you keep employees engaged by enabling them to connect and collaborate from anywhere.

When work can be anywhere, an open flow of information is crucial

Create the best environments for people to collaborate

Technology should work seamlessly in the background

Focus on the user experience

Unified Communications

Adapt to the changing landscape of work and meet disruption head on without affecting your productivity. Unify your suite of collaboration tools with a single platform to empower disparate teams and your flexible workforce.

  • High-quality video meetings

    Reliable, high-performing video experience for both you and your guests. Every time.

  • Total interoperability

    Connect all your video conferencing technology with a single solution.

  • Flexible deployments

    A cloud-native platform provided as a service or deployed as a self-hosted solution either on-premises or in any cloud environment.

Meeting Solutions

Deliver excellent user experiences in all your spaces—from small huddle to large conference rooms. Focus on getting down to business, not managing room Audio-Visual technology and connectivity. Ricoh Meeting Solutions offers you:

  • Advisory & Design services to pick the right solution
  • Expertly designed solution for ease of use
  • Standardised rooms for a consistent user experience
  • Skilled deployment of the solution
  • The right support to suit your business needs

Creative Collaboration Hub

The majority of organisations are actively using three or more unified communication platforms in connecting and interacting with their people, partners, and customers. Don’t let your team get frustrated by ineffective in-office and remote meeting collaboration tools. Ricoh’s Creative Collaboration Hub is a powerful interactive meeting solution that enables meaningful collaboration, regardless of the participant’s location, device, or unified communication platforms.

Microsoft Teams Rooms

In the hybrid workplace, how do we ensure all attendees—whether in offices or remote—can fully participate in meetings? Many room systems are designed primarily for people in the room, with remote users feeling left on the outside looking in. Microsoft Teams Rooms are designed to deliver inclusive meeting experiences with all participants in mind. With a rich ecosystem of connected meeting devices powered by an intuitive app built for Microsoft Teams, Teams Rooms turn any meeting room into an easy-to-use and inclusive collaboration space where everyone has a seat at the table, regardless of where they sit.

Ricoh and Microsoft Partnership
Microsoft Teams Rooms

In the hybrid workplace, how do we ensure all attendees—whether in offices or remote—can fully participate in meetings? Many room systems are designed primarily for people in the room, with remote users feeling left on the outside looking in. Microsoft Teams Rooms are designed to deliver inclusive meeting experiences with all participants in mind. With a rich ecosystem of connected meeting devices powered by an intuitive app built for Microsoft Teams, Teams Rooms turn any meeting spaces into an easy-to-use and inclusive collaboration space where everyone has a seat at the table, regardless of where they sit.

Ricoh has a strategic global relationship with Microsoft and extensive experience deploying Microsoft Teams Rooms solutions. We can help you modernise your workspaces, enhance meeting room experiences, and ensure your people stay focused on the business instead of being burdened by meeting room logistics.
